name: OCPIRegularHours
description: Regular recurring operation or access hours.

fields.name: weekday
fields.description: Number of days in the week, from Monday (1) till Sunday (7)

fields.name: period_begin
fields.description: Begin of the regular period, in local time, given in hours and minutes. Must be in 24h format with leading zeros. Example: "18:15". Hour/Minute separator: ":" Regex: ([0-1][0-9]|2[1-3]):[0-5][0-9].

fields.name: period_end
fields.description: End of the regular period, in local time, syntax as for period_begin. Must be later than period_begin.
